A fellow I know and his kantei group have come upon some correspondence 
be=
tween Messrs. Robinson and Caldwell having to do with their 
investigation =
of nihonto just post war. I have been asked if there are 
other sources of =
original (in facsimile) material and documentation 
that could be made avai=
lable to supplement these letters. The project 
is in preliminary stages an=
d any source is not too small at this point. 
John
